name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a classic soldier design, Volt stands tall with its hand-down arms and legs. Its screen emits a powerful laser beam, making it a formidable force to be reckoned with. Equipped with a wide range of abilities, skills, and a charismatic personality, Volt is ready to tackle any challenge that comes its way.
